summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4493 for the improvement of Henderson Street from 7th Avenue South and 8th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52794, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
